name: Faceball 2000
overview: "Virtual Reality" for your Super NES! Welcome to the exciting new world of FaceBall 2000, where 3D graphics, first person perspective and 360° maneuverability make you feel like you're inside your video game! What you see is where you are, as you team up, compete with a friend or play alone against computer-controlled opponents. Transport yourself inside the walls of CyberZone, where you'll be surrounded by menacing enemies lurking in a series of treacherous mazes. Or, enter the Arena where " Have a Nice Day" takes on a whole new meaning in fast-paced rounds of high-tech combat. Wherever you go in FaceBall 2000, it's your chance to wipe the smiles off those annoying happy faces - and maybe a few of your friends - once and for all!
